alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 18 at 10:24AM CST until January 18 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN RUSK AND NORTH CENTRAL NACOGDOCHES COUNTIES... At 1024 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Trawick, or 12 miles north of Nacogdoches, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Garrison around 1050 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lawsonville and Mount Enterprise. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
